#summary Description of the server API.
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =

Communication with the poker server happens through a HTTP connection. The client initiates the connection and send a POST request with a XML body. The server responds with some more XML.

= Details =

==Login==
====Request====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--CSPoker login request-->
<login>
 <username>guy</username>
</login>
}}}
====Response====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!--CSPoker login response-->
<login>
 <id>-3172786091566172558</id>
</login>
}}}
